author: iSazonov
body:
.Net Core 2.1.5 added Tizen RID https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/master/release-notes/2.1/2.1.5/2.1.5-commits.md#coreclr

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tizen
https://www.tizen.org/about
https://developer.tizen.org/development/visual-studio-tools-tizen/installing-visual-studio-tools-tizen

@SteveL-MSFT @joeyaiello For information. Perhaps PowerShell Core should be in Tizen project.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: If there is customer demand for it, we can see about producing builds.

title: Tizen
